review: buy if you want a realistic first person shooter :D

Played all the Age of Empires and got to say, 3 is the best out of all, gameplay is really really really really fuuuuuuuuuuun, graphics are sexy, AI is better and makes funny comments, has singleplayer campaign, background music is earworm..............why are you reading this review? BUY IT NOW AND PLAY IT!!!!!!!!! :D
I love Star Wars KOTOR, the story and gameplay is really fricken awesome, I rate it 10/10 because its a really fun game :D
